applyTo: '**'
---

Always go through the following workflow, in this specific order:

[design](./.github/instructions/workflow-design.instructions.md)
[plan](./.github/instructions/workflow-plan.instructions.md)
[plan-implementation](./.github/instructions/workflow-plan-implementation.instructions.md)
[develop](./.github/instructions/workflow-develop.instructions.md)
[check](./.github/instructions/workflow-check.instructions.md)
